thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 22 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: CORRECTED-(OFFICIAL)-BRIEF-MCJ to fully acquire Tekwind via stock swap

author: Reuters Editorial
title: CORRECTED-(OFFICIAL)-BRIEF-MCJ to fully acquire Tekwind via stock swap
text:
(Corrects second bullet to say one share of Tekwind Co will be exchanged with 0.58 shares of co, not the other way round)
Feb 22 (Reuters) - MCJ Co Ltd
* Says it will fully acquire Tekwind Co., Ltd., through stock swap, effective April 24
* Says one share of Tekwind Co., Ltd’s stock will be exchanged with 0.58 shares of the company
* Says 441,380 shares of the company’s stock will be exchanged
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/NcH1tM
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
